message.content:
1. Twenty-eight children participated in the study.
2. The median age of the children in the study was 9 months.
3. The median weight of the children in the study was 7 kg.
4. Isotopic data could be used for final calculations in only 20 subjects.
5. There were subjects in the study for whom isotopic data could not be used for final calculations.

messages.content:
Statement: Twenty-eight children (median age 9 months, median weight 7 kg) participated in the study, of whom in only 20 subjects isotopic data could be used for final calculations.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
